aircraft.value: Cobra Advanced - AC-5078-265 at Maintenance Hub-Y

defect_observed.value: Engine vibration level increase. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Engine Control component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage

preventive_action.value: Issue technical bulletin to all operators

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 23/01/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 25/01/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 25/01/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 26/01/2024 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 01/02/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

a) Root Cause Analysis: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Engine Control component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage

ii. Preventive Action: Issue technical bulletin to all operators
